cat.lump.ir.retrievalmodels.similarity

Class Article

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.ir.retrievalmodels.similarity.Article

  • public class Article
extends java.lang.Object
    An article object is the abstraction of a document to translate whith its related information.
    The related information is:
    • Language in which the article is written.
    • Type of data representation that must be used.
    Moreover, it provides functions to represent its data and calculate the magnitudes to use later by the similarity calculator.
    Author:
    jboldoba
    See Also:
    RepresentationType
